title: Sustainable agro-waste pellets as granular slow-release fertilizer carrier systems for ammonium sulfate
content:

B. G. K. Steiger, N. T. Bui, B. M. Babalola, L. D. Wilson
The preparation of ternary biocomposite carriers for ammonium sulfate that contain chitosan, torrefied wheat straw and avian eggshells is described. We demonstrate the promising potential of such carriers as slow-release fertilizer systems.
